88b3: shing ta la'i mgo bzhin rtsab nas bcad de 'gro ba snang ba med pa skye ste/ byi sa la mi skye ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa gas chugayos/
88b4: rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldegs so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi gnam logs na 'dug cing bsil yang
88b5: thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi// kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chu'i dra ba
88b6: zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ don gyi dra ba dang chos kyi dra ba dang tshangs pa'i dra ba zhes bya bar yang zud shig/ de bas na tshangs pa'i dra ba zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i tshig bla dgas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
88b7: bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yid rangs te mngon par bstod do/ / bar gyi sdom ni rtag dang cig du rgyu med dang mtha' ldan de bzhin lha mi spong // 'du shes 'dus shes med can dang // chad dang mya
88b8: ngan 'das pa dang / / dmyags dang kun nas rmongs pa dang // brten dang reg pa dge slong dang // rgyu dang don chos dra ba ste// tha ma tshangs pa'i dra ba'o// tshangs pa'i dra ba rdzogs s+ho// /

89a1: rgya'i skad du/ ta'i phang pen dro pa 'o na gang rngu' phrin ti yi// bod skad du/ thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo// bam po dang po// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/
89a2: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod spungs po'i ral dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong nyi khri brgyad stong thams cad kyang bya ba byas pa/ tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ klu chen
89a3: po ltar sems kyi dbang thob pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ 'od srung chen po dang / rab 'byor dang / kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang / mdzes bzang dang / byams ma'i bu gang po dang / lam chen bstan dang / sha ri'i bu dang / kA tI'i bu chen po dang /
89a4: kun dga' bo dang / sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa cang shes pa dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri brgyad stong dag dang thabs gcig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de
89a5: dag thams cad kyang yun ring por dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pas sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa rnams la rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa/ smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong snyed khong du chud cing
89a6: rtogs pa/ gzungs yongs su rdzogs pa/ snying rje chen po mi gtong ba sems can chen po ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad la phan par brtson pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par 'tsho ba pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan rnam
89a7: bar 'dzugs pa/ so so'i ma bskul bI dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ ye shes chen po'i 'gram du phyin pas kun tu grangs med pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub
89a8: sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag par brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glog gi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mnyam pa dang /

89b1: byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gtso bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs 'dzin dang /
89b2: byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag par snying rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od bcan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i dpal dang /
89b3: byang chub sems dpa' rin chen zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra dang / byang chub
89b4: sems dpa' seng ge byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge rnam par bgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon lam rdzogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang
89b5: chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ / de ma yin pa gzhan yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu tshad med pa brgya stong dag kyang lhag nas lha rdzas kyi
89b6: me tog dang spos rnams thogs shing lha rdzas kyi rol mo dkrol nas steng gi nam mkha' la 'khod do/ / de ma yin pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
89b7: chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / de la sogs pa so so nas 'khor brgya stong snyed lhags nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das la 'khor
89b8: mang pos yongs su bskor te/ rim gro dang mchod pa byas/ bkur sti dang bcas pas yongs su bstod ci byas so// de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kun dga' bo snga dri'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs

90a1: nas mthar gyis bsod snyoms blangs so/ / de'i dus na bram ze ba ma la sri'u cher byed pa/ khyims zhig nas ci yang mi bdog bcig kyang margan khur du khyer te/ mthar gyis slongs ma byed de/ de yang kha zas zhim po ro dang
90a2: ldan pa 'am/ shing thog bzang po dag rnyed na pha ma la stobs so// kha zas ngan pa ro med pa 'am/ shing thog skam po dag rnyed na bdag za'o// kun dga' bos de lta bu dag mthong nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ mi de la legs so
90a3: legs so zhes snyan par bstod nas rigs kyi bu pha ma la sri zhu byed cing mchod pa byed pa ngo mtshar che ste/ legs so zhes smras so// de nas kun tu rgyu ston pa drug gi bstan pa la phyogs shing grogs su gyur pa cig dbang po rno la gtsug
90a4: lag dang rig byed rnam pa bzhi la mkhas par gyur pa/ skar ma dang rtsis la mkhas pa/ dge sdig gi ltas rno ba/ mo dang gtsug lag gi rig pas pha rol gyi sems shes pa/ phal mang po'i slob dpon du gyur pa/ kun gyis bkur ba cig
90a5: lta ba ngan pa la zhen nas khe dang grags pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'jig par byed/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la phrag dog byed de/ smod pa'i phyir kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyi ston pa gau ta mI sha gi rigs kyi bu de ni
90a6: dge ba yin te/ yon tan chen po dang ldan no zhes smra ba yang ming tsam du zad de bden pa'i dngos po med do// khyod kyi ston pa gau ta mI ni yang dag par na sdig pa can yin te/ btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa nam yang shi bas sdig pa can yin
90a7: par mngon no/ / rgyal po'i pho brang na 'jug pa las pho brang nad nas bros pas yab rgyal po yang mya ngan gyis non te sems 'khrugs nas brgyal ba las chu gtor te/ zhag bdun lon pa dang dran pa phyir rnyed de tshe des btab nas de'i lha'i bu cig
90a8: d ed du stor re zhes snying rje rje skad du dus nas nga'i yul dang srid kyang khyod 'ba' shig dbang bar zad na ci'i phyir deng spangs te ri dgon par chas shes smre sngags 'don du bcug pas khyod kyi ston pa go ta mA drin mi shre te tsi la'ang ma bltas par langs

90b1: song bas na sri zhu med par yang mngon no/ / yab rgyal pos pho brang brtsigs nas chung ma blangs pa las kyi chung ma'i las ma byas te mya ngan gyis gdungs par byas pas na khrel med pa yang yin par mngon no// kun dga' bos de skad ces smras pa'i
90b2: tshig de dag thos nas de tsha zhing skyengs nas/ bsod snyoms blangs te phyir sangs rgyas gangan bar 'ongs nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
90b3: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i chos la pa ma la sri zhu bgyi ba lta ma mchis sam/ sangs rgyas kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 'di skad du zhu ba 'di khyod la su zhig gis bstan/ lha 'am mi 'am/ mi ma yin pas
90b4: bstan tam/ 'on te khyod nyid kyi shes pa'i blos de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar gyur ces bka' stsal pa dang / kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bdag la lha 'am/ klu 'am yi dgas sam/ mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa gang gis kyang bstan pa ma
90b5: mchis te/ snga dro bsod snyoms slong du mchis pa'i shul du ston pa drug gi 'khor kun du rgyu gcer bu ba cig dang mjal ba dang / bdag la tshig rtsub mo dag mchi'o zhes rgyas par gsol to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad nas zhal
90b6: gyi sgo nas kha dog rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od byung bas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad med pa bye ba brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams bla ma mchog ces bya ba snang bar byas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams den
90b7: sangs rgyas dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa
90b8: ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu bkod pa zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing bai dUr+ya las byas pa/ gser gtsoms thig re'u bris pa/ rin po che sna bdun

91a1: byi shing bskyed pa/ shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang tsam du mtho ba me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / 'dab mas shin du brgyan pa/ rlung mi drag pas bskyod na/ sba snyan pa 'byung ba/ glu de dag so so'i skye bos thos/
91a2: pas mi ngoms pa/ skabs skabs na chu mig dang / 'tshe'u dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su ga ba/ rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye ma brdal ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhin dri bsung dam pa dang ldan rin
91a3: me tog pad ma dang / bun/ rika dang / ba ri sha ka dang / de ma yin pa'i ma tog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po na nyi'i bang lo tsam gyis chu'i steng yangs su lebs te/ chude'i nang na bya rnam pas chags kyang shin tu med
91a4: du'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to/ / rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/ de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do// rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar ba da na seng ge khri mtho khyed kyi tshad dpag tshad
91a5: gcig pa bshams nas rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/ lha rdzas kyi na bza' khri'i steng du rim par btid pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'bul ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gis chal bar bkram pa'i khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa dga'
91a6: ba'i rgyal po dkyil mo dkrung du bcas shing bzhugs pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du 'khod te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsal/ to/
91a7: bcom ldan 'das ci'i d+ha ci'i rkyen gyis 'dababang po kha dag sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar ba dang ldan pa/ rab thugs la ba dper mi bzod pa 'di nub phyogs lags nas 'khar mang po 'dadi dag la
91a8: snang bar dgur te/ / sa gas dag thams cad lus dang sems bde bar 'gyur ba de thugs ce ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis brtan du gsol// de la bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//

91b1: sa ga lags pa / la shinasan lan shis dang ma ba sha pa / skyenas ba rgyags lagasas gtan rnams dam parnab sa pa sa tu
91b2: zhing mimad ces bya ba yod/ de na sangs rgyas bya thub pazhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ ba dbang shegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa
91b3: sa su 'dal bal la lo srung ba blan med pa/ stan pa rgyal gA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan das shes bya pa 'khor ma pas yongs su bkod nas/ 'khor mang pathams cad la thangs mkhas pa chen badzin lan pas pa na
91b4: mad sde ston cing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde blo don gyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rngurtsa nas gdon pa'i phyir/ sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi lam las phyir
91b5: me ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phying byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing sangs rgyas
91b6: kyi drin lan bas pa pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyis drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bskal ba'i byer sa sa'i skye bo mtha' dag pa mdag la sri'u bya bar 'dod pa'i
91b7: phyi 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no/ / de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te tha gos brag pa cig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas
91b8: pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dar mchi zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub

92a1: pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa chen po sang sa rgyas zin lan bsab pa'i mdo dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis rlab tu gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa'
92a2: de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu dag khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang / shin tu phrad par bka' ba'i 'du shes
92a3: skyed par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni bskal grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu spyad dka' ba smad de/ snying rje chen pos smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo// gal te mngon par sangs rgyas
92a4: pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can ri dang / shang shong dang / gyo mo dang gseg ma dang / tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang / bcas pa mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu
92a5: rdzogs par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spyad de/ bde ba thams cad dang yongs su ldan par byas nas chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs
92a6: shing lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam du btab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas je
92a7: ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar gnas par bya'o// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das
92a8: kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag re rel 'khor byang chub sems dang 'bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bder song ngo / /

92b1: de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gdang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od zer chen po yang kun tu snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyi me tog man dA ra ba dang / man rA ra
92b2: ba chen po yang char bzhin pab bo/ / 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mched med pa
92b3: stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag bya rgod spungs pa'i rig la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i sman sngar lhags nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs
92b4: rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do/ / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gyis nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig
92b5: brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams dag pa'i gnas shes bya ba snang bar byas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyi zla mar me'i 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
92b6: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bskur ba bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
92b7: bde ba can zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin du mnyam zhing gzhi bai dUr+ya las byas pa/ gser gcoms thig re'i bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/ shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du
92b8: mthob/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / 'dab mas shin tu rgyan pa/ rlung ni drag pas bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba/ sgra de dag so so'i skye bos thos pas mi dems pa/ skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang /

93a1: khrus kyi rdzing bu yod pa yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing / rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas brdal ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhin dri bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad ma dang / kun Ta ri ka
93a2: pa ri sha ka dang / de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po shing rta'i pang lo tsam chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/ chu'i nang na yang bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin du yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin te/
93a3: rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de/ de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do// rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khri mtho khyad kyi tshad dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas
93a4: rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi na bzas khri'i steng du rim par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi tshal bar bkram pa'i khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla mar me'i 'od dkyil mo dkrung
93a5: bcas shing bzhugs pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan
93a6: 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang / dkar por bcas pa dang ldan pa/ rab tu gsal ba dper mi bzod pa 'di shar phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag snang
93a7: bar gyur te/ gang la 'od kyi reg pa de dag thams cad lus dang sems bde bar gyur pa thugs rtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol// de la bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
93a8: rigs kyi bu legs par nyon la shin du yid la legs par zung shig dang / khyed la dgrol bar bshad par bya'o// 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na sangs rgyas

93b1: kyi zhing mi mdzod ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen
93b2: pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ ston pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas 'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston
93b3: cing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi gyir sems can thams cad kyi log par lta ba'i zug rngu rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir/ sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi lam las mi ldog cing rten
93b4: par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i
93b5: phyir/ sems can thams cad kyis drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir so so'i skye bo dag pha ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin
93b6: no/ / de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang / ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te bla gos phyogs cig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lta nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
93b7: 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /
93b8: thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol// de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag

94a1: khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der byin nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang shin du phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyin zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub
94a2: ba ni skal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin du spyad dka' ba spyad de snying rje chen pos smon lam 'di skad ces btab po/ / gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can ri dang / shang shong dang /
94a3: gyo mo dang / gseg ma dang tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang / bcas pa mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyad pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs rgyas te/ phan
94a4: pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam btab po//
94a5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams deng phyin nas ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang / 'dra bar gan
94a6: par bya'o/ / zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa'
94a7: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der song ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/
94a8: 'od zer chen po yang kun tu snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snad las lha rnams kyis me tog man dA ra ba dang man dA ra ba chen po yang char bzhin phab po// 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang

94b1: gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so/ / de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma bkrol bar 'od zer bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bya rgod srungs pa'i ri ga la ba
94b2: der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kha dog rnam pa lnga
94b3: dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gyis byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig lnga brgya 'das pa'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams dbang phyug grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba snang bar byas so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de na
94b4: sangs rgyas pad mo leb rgan gyi 'od ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
94b5: ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa ston pa rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba na bzhugs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin du mnyam zhing gzhi bai dUr+ya las byas pa/ gser gtsoms
94b6: thig re'u bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa/ shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gad tsam du mtho ba me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / yal ga dang / 'dab mas shin tu brgyan pa/ rlung mi drag pas bskyod pas sgra snyan
94b7: pa 'byung ba/ sgra de yang so so'i skye bos thos na mi ngoms pa/ skabs skabs na chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing rdzing gi zhabs kyang gsar
94b8: gyi bye mas brdal ba/ rdzing gi ngos bzhin bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog pad ma dang / bun Da ri ka dang / ba ri sha ka dang / de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po shing rta'i

95a1: 'phang lo tsam du chu'i steng yongs su khebs te/ chu'i nang na bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang shin du yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de de nas ma/
95a2: can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do// rin po che'i shing de dag gi bar bar na seng ge'i khri mtho khyad dpag tshad gcig pa bshams nas rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan te/ lha rdzas kyi na bzas khri'i steng du
95a3: rim par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri 'thul ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi chal bar dkram pa'i khri'i thog na de bzhin gsheg pa pad mo'i leb rgan gyi 'od chags pa dkyil ma dkrung du bcas shing bzhugs pa la byung /
95a4: chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen
95a5: gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar por bcas pa dang ldan pa/ rab tu gsal ba/ dper mi bzod pa 'di lho phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang bar gyur te/ gang la/
95a6: 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad lus dang sems bde bar 'gyur ba thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi
95a7: bu dag legs par nyon la shin du yid la zung shig dang khyed la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o/ / 'di nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi med/
95a8: ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu

95b1: ' dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba blan med pa ston pa rgyang ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas 'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bas pa pa'i mdo lnga ston cing sems
95b2: tsan thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi zug rngurtsab nas 'don pa'i sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
95b3: mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig la dgod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon par byang chub cing sangs rgyas kyi dran lan bas za pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyis drin lci ba dran par bya 'i phyir/
95b4: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir/ so so'i skye bo dag pha ma la sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'od 'di snang bar gyur pa yin no// de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang
95b5: bo'on na gtso bo dang / ston par gyur pa stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs par gyur nas bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/
95b6: bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis bdag cag rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi shing de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / thabs mkhas pa
95b7: chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin gyis brlab du gsol/ / de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag
95b8: khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang / shin du phrad dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni/

96a1: bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin du spyad dka' ba spyod pas snying rje chen pos smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo// gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can/
96a2: ra dang shang shong dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma dang cher ma 'asogs pa'i yod pa gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/ mtshams med pa lnga dang mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyad pa'i gnas der mngon par sangs/
96a3: rgyas te phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas nas chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs shing lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam
96a4: btab bo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des thog ma de skad ces smon lam btab pas khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid gshegs pa dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas nyid bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar gnas/
96a5: par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re yang 'khor byang
96a6: chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der dong ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du phyin par 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnam
96a7: pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'od zer chen po yang kun tu snang bar gyur/ steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyi me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po yang char bzhin phang po// 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas shing rdzu 'bral
96a8: gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang g.yos so/ / de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi rol mo tshad med pa brgya stong snyed kyang steng gi bar snang la ma dkrol bar rang zer bzhin du byang chub sems

96b1: dpa' de dag bya rgod spangs pa'i rig la ba der de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas la lan gsum bskor babyas nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de bzhin du phyogs/
96b2: mtshams bzhi dang / steng dang 'og gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis so so nas 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
96b3: lhags nas mchod pa dang / bkur sti byas/ stong pa byas nas thams cad mgrin cig tu tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bstod do// de ltar sangs rgyas la bdon nas kyang phyogs cig tu 'khod
96b4: do/ / de'i tshe mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang yongs su dag par gyur te/ ri khrad khrod dang / ri chen po dang / chu dun dang / gtsang po dang / chu rlung dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing dang / lteng ka dang / shar shong dang / dam grog dag med
96b5: c ing de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'od kyis snang bar byas pas sangs rgyas gang na ba der lhags te dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mig mi 'dzums par chags pa'i
96b6: yid kyis lta zhing 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer phyir 'dus par mdzad de/ 'od zer de dag gis sku la lan bdun bskor nas dbu'i spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de ltar gyur pa kun dga' bos mthong nas/
96b7: 'khor mang po thams dbang bcom skyes par sems kyis rab tu shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thabs mkhas pa mngon par bstan pa dang phying ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo dag gi shes rab kyi mig skye ba dang / so so'i skye bo thams cad
96b8: sred pa'i chu klung las rgal zhing pha rol du phyin pas bde ba la dgod pa dang / so so'i skye bo dag la pha ma dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i drin lci ba dran zhing shes par bya ba'i phyir stan las langs nas gos tshags su bcos nas

97a1: bla gos phyogs gag tu byas nas pus mos la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun dga' bos sangs rgyas kyi 'bas
97a2: 'bring na mchis nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste 'di la nges par dgongs pa ni mnga' na 'khor mang po'i the tsom gyi dra ba gcad pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ / sangs rgyas kyis bshad du gsol// thabs
97a3: mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o/ / // de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor mang po 'dus pa der rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i pad pa'i snong bo dral las byas/ 'ad
97a4: mamini gser las byas/ gzhi ni rin po che shel las byas/ mu tig gi dra bas kun tu brgyan pa gcig de nyid nas byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa las bzhengs nas pad mo de la dkyil mo dkrung
97a5: bcas nas bzhugs so/ / de la bzhugs ma thag tu yongs su dag pa'i sku mngon par bstan to// swA de lam rgyud lnga'i lus kyi tshogs bstan/ lus kyi tshogs re re la yang gzugs tha dad pa rnam pa khri brgyad stong snyed bstan to//
97a6: gzugs rnam pa de re re la yang sku'i tshogs brgya stong snyed bstan/ sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan to// gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang gling
97a7: bzhi'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan to/ / rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs de dag re re la yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i rogs bstan to// rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs
97a8: de dag re re la yang phyogs bcur phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sku'i tshogs bstan nas/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa bsam kyis mi khyab

97b1: pa snyed kyi sems can gyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan to/ / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas de snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan nas kun dga' bo dang / phyogs bcu na sa 'dus shing tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
97b2: sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag deng de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag pa'i tshig gang yin pa bka' stsal par bya'o//
97b3: chos la tshig tu brjod pa med kyi de bzhin gshegs pas thabs mkhas pa'i dbang gis mtshan ma dang ming med pa'i chos la ming dang mtshan mar bstan par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thog sar skyes shing 'khor bar
97b4: 'khor ba'i tshe bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa de dag thams cad rdzogs par myong ste/ de ltar lus kyi tshogs de dag kun myong bas na sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
97b5: ba mar ma gyur pa med/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sems can gyi pha mar ma gyur pa med de/ pha mar gyur pa thams cad kyi phyir rgyun tu shin tu spyad dka' ba yang spyad/ shin du gtang dka' ba yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang / mig
97b6: dang / glang rgyas dang / yul dang / grong khyer dang / chung ma dang / bu mo dang / khal glang dang / rta dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ha dang / theg pa dang gos dang / zas dang skom dang / mal cha dang nad kyi rkyen gyi dang dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad
97b7: gang yang ma gtang ba med do/ / shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / sbyin pa byas pa dang / mdu thu thos pa dang / bsam gtan bsgos pa dang / shes rab spyad pa nas spyad dga' thathams cad pyad de/ skyo zadang
97b8: ngal ba med cing rgyun mi 'chad par brtson 'grus su 'bad pa yang pham la sris bya ba dang / drin shes pa dang / drin lan bas pa pa dang / sems can thams cad myur du than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod pa dang /

98a1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / da ltar na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin chen po yod par shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen
98a2: pos sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / rtag par shin du thabs mkhas pas khams gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du mnyam snyoms pa'i byams
98a3: pa bsgoms shing btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i thabs mkhas pas spyod de/ sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / chos stong pa nyid dang / phung po lnga stong pa nyid du rtogs shing phyir mi rur ba dang / mi 'bying ba dang / mi rgod pa stong pa
98a4: nyid du yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la thabs mkhas pas bsgom par bya ba dang / theg pa gsum mi spong zhing chub par slob pa'i thabs la mkhas pas shin tu zab mo'i spyod yul dam pa smad pa la thabs mkhas par bya ba'i phyir
98a5: chos kyi mtshan nyid la shin du gsal bar rtogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thog ma dang tha ma'i bar du cig ma yin par rtogs shing chud kyang so so'i skye bo dag ni myos shing bslang pas gdung ba gsum gyis yongs su gdung te
98a6: sdug bsngal gyi mtshor nub par gyur to/ / phyin ci log bzhis bsgribs pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos la phyin ci log tu gyur to// mi bden pa kun du rtog pas bdag med pa la bdag tu blta/ mi rtag pa la rtag par lta/ mi bde
98a7: ba la bde bar lta/ mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar lta zhing skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi bas gzir te/ skad cig tu mi rtag pas sgrib pa lnga dang / kun nas glags pa bcus kun tu glags te/ srid pa gsum du 'khor zhing ste shi thog
98a8: ma dang tha ma med pa myong bar gyur to/ / de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang cir 'phrod pa bzhin sde snod gsum dang / mdo sde dgu nas mdo sngo bcu gnyis kyi bar du rnam par phye zhing bstan to// so so'i 'dod pa bzhin mdo sde mang

98b1: po gsungs so/ / tshig la chags pa kha cig bdag ni 'di kho nas chog ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob ces 'dzin pa yang yod do// de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi thugs rje chen po'i smon lam gyi shugs phyogs bcu'i 'jig
98b2: rten gyi khams na las 'thun pa thams cad bsdus so/ / de ltar las 'thun pa kun 'dus pa 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor der dam pa'i mdo sde gsungs par dgongs te/ gzugs rnyan gyi chos nam du yang chun mi 'chad
98b3: cing so so'i skye bo thams cad bde ba chen po thob par mdzad do/ / de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'dul zhing ston pa yang dus las mi yol bar shes/ dus las mi yol bar mya ngan las 'da'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kha cig
98b4: du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/
98b5: bla na med pa ston pa rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes grags so// skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas su gshegs nas lha rnams kyi ston pa mdzad do// skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas nas babs te/ 'dzam
98b6: bu'i gling du sku tshe lo brgyad bcur bzhugs pa yang ston to/ / de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// 'jig rten gyi khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab po// las kyi rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab po//
98b7: sems can gyi bsam pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab po// bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// klu'i mthu yang bsam gyis mi khyab po// 'di ni sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyis
98b8: sangs rgyas kyi thugs la dgongs pa shes par 'dod na sems can dbang po zhan pa tha ma'i bar du yang kun shes par mdzad do/ / sems can thams cad las gang yang sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod na de ma thag tu mthong bar mdzad do/

99a1: gal te mthong bar mi mdzad na mig sbar ba ba kyang mi mthong ngo // de bas na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa yod kyang mthong bar mi nus so// de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyis
99a2: 'od zer chen po bkye nas srid pa'i rtse mo man chad mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad snang bar mdzad kyang gang 'dul ba'i bskal pa dang ldan pas ni mthong bar 'gyur/ gang bskal pa dang mi ldan tha ni mig sdang bab kyang
99a3: mi mthong ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa skabs kha cig tu skul ba mdzad/ skabs kha cig tu ni cang mi gsung bas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ shin du dpag par dka' ba/ shin tu shes shing rtogs par
99a4: dka' na ji ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gsheg pa la spyad dka' ba shin du zab mo dri ba la spobs par gyur/ khyod kyis zhus pa 'di ni yang dag par sems can thams cad la byams shing snying rtse ba yin te/ ngan 'gro gsum gyi lam
99a5: bkag nas lha dang mi'i lam btong pa yin no/ / kun dgra bongs khyod la pa ma la sri zhu bya ba'i spyad dka' ba mdo tsam zhig bstan par byas legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang /
99a6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sngon byung ba bskal pa tshad med pa mtha' yas grangs med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na yul ba rA na sIr sangs rgyas rnam par
99a7: gzigs shes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ ston/
99a8: brgyal ba 'jig rten gyi gtso bo/ lha dang mi'i ston pa/ 'jig rten du byung ngo // sangs rgyas de'i sku'i tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur bzhugs so// dam pa'i chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur gnas so// gzugs brnyan

99b1: kyi chos kyang bskal pa chung ngurtsi shur gnas so/ / gzugs brnyan gyi chos la spyod pa'i tshe me'i rgyal po rA dza zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ yul bA rAn sA la dbang sgyur ro// rgyal po de la btsun mo ni nyi khri yod/ blon po ni bzhi
99b2: stong snyed yod/ bal gyi glang po che yang lnga brgya yod/ rgyal phran drug bcu la dbang / grong khyer brgyad brgya zhig yod/ rgyal po de la rgyal bu gsum yod de/ gsum char yang rgyal phran re re byed do// de'i tshe de'i dus na yul bA rA na
99b3: sde'i rgyal po de mkhas shing shes rab dang ldan te/ rtag tu yang drad pa'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin pas gang yang gtams las chad ces bya ba med do// rgyal po'i bsod nams dang / yon tan gyi mthus char chu dus las mi yol
99b4: te/ lo tog rgyun tu legs pas de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang bde skyid do// de'i tshe bA rA na sde'i rgyal po de la blon po nag po sgra gcan zhes bya ba zhig yod do blon po sgra gcan rgyal po la 'khus nas dmag rnam bzhi bshams pa
99b5: la 'di lta ste/ ba glang gi tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshigs dang / chogs dang / pung bu chung gi tshogs bshams nas bA rA na se'i rgyal po la brgal nas rgyal po'i srog bcad do// de ltar rgyal po bsad nas kyang dmag gi tshogs rnam pa
99b6: bzhi bkye nas mtha'i rgyal phran bu rab kyang bsad do/ / de nas rgyal bu 'bring po yang bab nas mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu tha chungs kyi thog tu dmag drang bar bshams so// rgyal bu tha chungs de ngo mtshar du gzugs byad bzang
99b7: la/ 'phags par mdzes shing rang bzhin gyis dge gdul ba/ 'dzum zhing smra ba/ spa'o cog kyang phan pa'i don du smra zhing 'gyur gyi/ gnod pa med pa/ rtag tu drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin te/ log pas mi 'tsho
99b8: bas yul gyi mi rnams kyang bde skyid la dar ba/ longs spyod dang nor rin po cher ldan pa/ bad mdzod gang ba/ rgyal ba de'i yon tan la kun gyis bsngags shing bstod pa bar snang gi lha dang / 'jig rten gyi lha thams

100a1: cad kyis kyang dga' zhing bkur ba/ da' tshan rgyal pa la rgyal bu su shade ba zhes bya ba cig pu zhig yod de/ shin du 'dag 'a shing gsal ba/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba/ lus
100a2: mdog gser du 'dug pa/ gnas bdun mnyam par gang ba/ skyes bu'i mtshan rdzogs par ldan pa/ lo bdun len pa zhig yod pa de la yab rgyal po yang shin tu byams shing sdug par sems so// de'i chen po zang srung ba'i lha
100a3: shig rgyal po de la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rgyal po mkhyen tam/ blon po sgra gcan 'grus nas yul srid thogs te rgyal po yab kyang bkrongs/ dmag gi tshogs bzhi yang bkyenas/ rgyal po gcen gnyis kyang sog gi dbang po dang
100a4: pral te/ dmag gi tshogs rnams ring po mi thogs par 'dir phyin na rgyal po ci'i phyir srog bskyabs shing gung du mi 'gro// de'i tshe rgyal po des de skad smras pa thos nas lus kyi ba spu kun zing zhes byed de/ lus kyang 'dar nas
100a5: mug cing mya ngan gyis sems gdungs te/ sa la 'gre zhing brgyal bar 'gyur nas ring zhig lon pa dang / cung zad sangs te dal gyis nam mkha'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar smra ba'i skad ni yod la gzugs ni mi snang ba khyod ci
100a6: yin/ smras pa'i tshig 'di yang dag par bden nam/ ltas smras pa bdag ni rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba'i lha yin te/ rgyal po khyod shes pa dang ldan zhing bsod nams dang / yon tan du bcas drang po'i chos kyi yul srid 'dzin te/ de
100a7: bas na bdag gis spras pa yin te/ sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs par ma gyur par myur du byol zhing 'gro ba'i rigs so// de nas rgyal po de pho brang du bzhugs nas de ni bdag yul gzhan zhig tu 'gro dgos so snyam du bsams
100a8: so/ yang 'di snyam du bsams so yul pha rol tu 'gro ba la lam gnyis yod de/ lam nye bar zhugs na ni zhag bdun gyis yul pha rol du phyin par 'gyur/ lam ring por zhugs na ni zhag bcu bzhis phyin par 'gyur bas/

100b1: nas lamanye bar 'gro'o snyam pasams nas zhag bdun gyi rgyags dang chas te/ pho brang gi phyi rol du phyin pa dang / phyir pho brang gi nang du lag nas rgyal bu su she da ba phang du blangs te mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing sngangs
100b2: pa ltar langs nas phyir yang 'dug go/ de'i tshe na btsun mos de ltar mi bde zhing skrag pa ltar gyur pa mthong nas/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal po chen po ci'i slad du 'jigs skrag pa lta bu'i gzugs ston
100b3: cing sru la yang rdul gyis gos pa lta bu/ sgra yang 'dzings te/ dbugs kyang mi bde ste/ yul stong la thug pa'am/ mdza' sdug pa dang / bya ba 'am/ dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa lta bu dang / bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan ma dag gda' ba'adi
100b4: ci lags bstan du gsol/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ kho bo ci nyes pa khyed shes pa yin gyis ma smra zhig/ btsun mos gsol pa/ bdag dang rgyal por lus gzugs gnyis kyang sems cig ste/ dper na bya'i 'dab ma gnyis
100b5: sam/ lus kyi rkang pa gnyis sam/ mgo'i mig gnyis sam/ de dang 'dra na ci'i slad du bdag la gsang ste mi gsung / rgyal pos btsun mo la smras pa/ khyed mi shes sam/ blon po sgra gcan ngan sems skyes nas rgyal po
100b6: l a 'thas te yab rgyal po yang dkrongs te gcen tal bu yang srog gi bar chad byas nas da ltar dmag dang chas te ngal rgol du 'ong bas kho ba yul gzhan du 'byol du 'gro zhes smras nas rgyal bu dge don par du blangs
100b7: te/ lam du zhugs so// de nas btsun mo yang rgyal po'i phyir 'brangs te song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po mya ngan gyis non te/ yid 'khrugs nas zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas lam yang nor te/ lam de yang bzod dka' zhing
100b8: rtsa yang rtsub/ rtsa chu tsam yang med de/ zhag du ma zhig song ba las rgyags kyang chad do// thog ma gsang ste rgyal po gcig pu 'gro bar byas nas zhag bdun gyi rgyags las kyang ma brdzangs pa las lam yang nor// mi gsum

101a1: gyes kyang zos te/ / zhag bcu bzhi'i lam du zhugs pas da dung lam reng zhig yod pa las rgyags chad nas/ de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mos skad phyung nas dus so// kye hud kyi hud re sdug thog pa bcas nas de tsam gyi bar
101a2: 'di 'dra ba ma myong ba nga 'dir myong bar gyur te/ da 'dir sdug cing phongs so zhes zer te lag pas mgol bsdabs so// sa la 'gre zhing lus la rdul gyis gos nas tshig 'di skad du smre sngags 'don to// bdag cag gis che snga ma la
101a3: sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci zhig byas/ 'on te pha ma dang dgra bcom pa bsad dam// 'on te dam pa'i chos la skur ba btab bam/ 'on te 'thun pa'i dge 'dun gyi dben bgyis sam/ 'on te rngon pa dang nye ba byas sam/ 'on te srad dang
101a4: bre bcos te pha rol lo phrag rlom byas sam/ 'on te dge 'dun gyi nor la spyod spyod dam/ ci byas na 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur ces de skad sme zhing cung zad ster ni dgras slebs na srog gi bar chad nges par 'byung / lam du
101a5: zhugs nas 'gror ni bkres pa dang / skom pas nyan nas srog la bab tu che'o// rgyal po dang btsun mo de lta bu'i sdug bsngal nyen te skad phyung ste rus pa dang sa la 'gyel nas rgyal bar gyur to// de nas ring zhig len pa dang sangs nas 'di
101a6: snyam du gsum char lhan cig tu kho nar 'chi bar 'gyur gyis/ btsun mo bsad la bdag dang bu'i srog thar par bya'o snyam bsams nas ral gri phyung ste btsun mo bsad par bshams pa dang / rgyal bu dge don gyis rgyal po'i lag
101a7: pa nas bzung ste/ de ltar ci zhig mdzad dgongs shes gsol to// yab rgyal pos mig nas mchi mas gang bzhin du rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyi ma btsun mo dam pa bsad la khyod kyi srog gso snyam mo gal te ma
101a8: bsod kyi nga 'chi bar 'gyur te/ kho bo ni 'chi'am gson yang rung na bu khyod kyi srog gso ba'i phyir khyod kyi ma btsun mo gsad snyam mo// de nas rgyal bu dag don gyis yab rgyal bu la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te btsun mo

101b1: bsad par gyur na da'i sha la bdag mi 'tshal te/ gang na yang ma'i shal bu zab mi srid pas bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur na yang / rgyal po ci'i slad du bdag bkum ste/ pha ma'i srog thar par mi mdzad/ yab rgyal pos de
101b2: skad ces smras pa thos nas mod la 'khams te 'gyel nas sa la 'gri zhing rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ / khyod kho bo'i mig dang 'dran su zhig rang gi mig phyung ste/ za bar byed kho bo ni shi 'ang bla bas/ bu mi gsod do// bu
101b3: bsad nas sha za mi nus so/ / de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis yang yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te yab yum gyis bdag bkum na sha khrag kyang ring po mi thog par rul sungs nas dgos pa ma mchis par
101b4: 'gyur te/ bdag gis gsol pa cig gcig ma gnang na byams pa'i yab yum ma lags pas bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas yab rgyal pos sras rgyal bu la khyod kyi yid dang mi 'gal bar
101b5: bya bas ci gsol ba rnams myur du smros shig/ ces sgo ba dang / rgyal bu dge don gyis yab rgyal po la 'di skad gsol to// yab yum gyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du nyin re re zhing bdag gi lus la sha rgya ma gsum
101b6: gsum bcad de/ cha gnyis ni yab yum la 'bul/ cha gcig ni bdag 'tshal na lus srog gi gzungs su 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal pos kyang rgyal bus gsol pa bzhin du gnang nas nyin cig bzhin sha rgya ma gsum gsum
101b7: bcad de/ cha gnyis na rgyal po dang btsan moT/ cha gcig ni rgyal bu dang za ste/ lus dang srog ga gzungs byas nas lam du zhugs te song pa las zhag gnyis kyis yul pha rol ma slebs par rgyal bu'i lus kyi ga zu
101b8: de rus pa'i tshigs dang chu ba tsam zhig 'brel te srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig lus nas sa la 'gyel to/ / de nas rgyal po dang btsun mos rgyal bu dang du blangs nas skad chen po byung nas tshe des chen po btab ste 'di skad ces smraso//

102a1: deng gnyis kyi sa ma rig par khyod kyi sha zos te khyod 'di lta bun tsha ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur la/ lam yang dadung ring bas khyod kyi lus kyi sha ni zad de/ de ni lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro gzhag go/ de nas rgyal bu dge
102a2: don gyis skad chung ngus yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / nga 'di nas pha rol tu zhag gcig tsam gyi lam las ma lus te bdag ni g.yo zhing skyod mi nus las srog 'dir 'dor ro// rgyal po dang btsun mo ni mi mang bayang ngan pa
102a3: ltar lhan cig tu gnas 'dir ro gzhag go ma gsung shig/ bdag la byams shing thugs rtse bar dgongs na bdag gi bsams pa dang mi 'gal bar mdzad du gsol// da dung yang bdag gi rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa ma lus par
102a4: btogs la yul pha rol tu gshegs su gsol/ de nas rgyal pos yang rgyal bus gsol pa bzhin du tshigs dang rus pa'i gseb na sha ci yod pa btogs nas cha gsum du bgos te/ cha gnyis ni rgyal po dang btsun mos zos// cha cig/
102a5: dergal bus zos te/ rgyal po dang btsun mo yang lam du zhugs nas dong ngo // rgyal bu dge don langs nas 'greng bzhin du rgyal po dang btsun mo song ba la lha'o// rgyal po dang btsun mo gnyis skad phyung nas du shing song nas rgyal bu dge
102a6: don gyis mig gis mi sod kyi bar du rgyal po dang btsun mo'i chags pI sems kyis mig mi btsum par lta lta nas ring zhig lon pa dang / phyir sa la 'gyel to// sha dang khrag gi dri bro bas phyogs bcu nas sbrang ma dang / sha sbrang mang po
102a7: 'dus nas rgyal bu yog pa tsam du lus la za zhing 'dzugs te sdug bsngal gyis gdungs so/ / de'i tshe na rgyal bu de srog gi lhag ma tsam zhig mchad de/ skar phyung nas 'di skad ces smon lam btab bo// bdag ga sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las rnams
102a8: ni 'dis byang zhing zad par gyur cig/ deng slan chad mi bgyid do// bdag gi lus pha ma la phul te sbyin pa byas pas bdag gi pha ma bas lhag pa'i bsod nams bcu gcig dang ldan te/ bde bar nyal ba dang / bde bar sad pa dang / rmi lam

102b1: ngan pa mi rmi pa dang / lhas srung ba dang / mis srung ba dang / zhal mchu dang / rkun po dang / dgra dang / rku to byed pa med cing dus thams cad du bkra shis par shog shig/ bdag gi lus lhag sa tsam ga khrag spang ma la byin pas thams cad
102b2: 'grangs shing tshim par gyur te/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas grub par shog sheg/ sangs rgyas su grub nas chos kyi sku thob nas kyang chos kyi skus thams cad kyi dkris skom pa'i mu ge dang / skye shir
102b3: 'khor ba'i nang lce ba sel bar shog shig/ rgyal bus de skad ces smon lam btab pa na ga nam sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ nyi ma yang 'od migasal bar gyur/ gcan zan dang ri dgas rnams kyang skrag nas kun tu rgyag/ rgya mtsho/
102b4: yang rab tu 'khrugs/ ri rab kyang 'gul zhing ldeg/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gnam gyi bar du yang rab tu g.yos so// de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dag dang / 'dzam bu'i gling dag tu babs nas rgyal bu don grub
102b5: pa sdigs pa'i phyir seng ge dang / stag dang / 'phar spyang la sogs pa'i lus su sprul nas mig dgrad/ kha gdangs/ spu bsgrengs nas skad chen po'i ra ro phyung ste/ rgyal bu la mchod pa bzhin bsdigs so// de'i tshe rgyal bu don grub kyis gcan/
102b6: zan khro ba de dag mthong nas kyang skad mi che bas 'di skad ces smras so// khyed rnams kho bo za 'dod na ci bder zo zhig/ 'di 'dra ba'i mthu rtsal gyis bsdigs ci dgos shes sgo'o// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ bdag cag sed/
102b7: ge 'am gcan zan ma yin gyi/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po yin te khyod bag ma zhing sad du 'ongs so// de'i tshe rgyal bus brgya byin lha'i dbang po mthong nas shin tu dga' mgrangs par gyur de// de nas brgya byin gyis rgyal bu'i sgras ma khyod kyi
102b8: shin tu dka' ba btang ste/ lus kyi ga khrag gis pa ma la btabs pa 'di'i bsod nams kyis khyed 'drad kyi rgyal po 'dod dam 'on te tshang sa pa'i rgyal ba 'dod dam/ lha'i dbang po'am/ ma'i rgyal po 'ab/ 'khor los snar ba'i rgyal

103a1: po 'dod/ rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag ni rgyal po'amatshangs pa 'am/ lha'i rgyal po 'am/ mi'i rgyal po 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang yang mi 'dod de/ sems can thams cad rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir
103a2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod do/ / brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod ni shin tu yang dgati mug can zhig yin pa 'dra/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni yun ring po nas shin tu dka' ba bsgrubs pa
103a3: bzod 'grub ce'o/ / khyod kyis shin tu sdug bsngal ba bzod dang / rgyal bus smras pa/ gal te lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba dag gi spyi bo'i steng nas rgyun tu 'khor yang sdug bsngal de tsam gyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
103a4: pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod kyis smras pa stong pa 'di la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/ de nas rgyal bus dam bcas nas smon lam 'di skad ces btab po// gal te bdag gis smras pa'i tshig
103a5: brdzun te lha'i dbang po bslus par gyur na/ bdag gi lus kyi rma 'di nam du yang 'tsho bar ma gyur cig/ gal te smras pa'i tshig bden na/ bdag gi lus kyang sor chud cing khrag kyang 'o mar gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu lus kyi rmam
103a6: snga ma kho bzhin sor chud de/ khrag kyang 'o mar gyur nas rgyal bu'i byad gzugs kyang snga bas lhag par bzang zhing sdug pa dang mdzes par gyur te langs nas lha'i dbang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
103a7: byin gyis rgyal bu khyod legs so/ / shin tu legs so shin du dpa' ba'i brtson 'grus kyis gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chubathob par 'gyur ro// ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
103a8: byang chub thob pa na thog mar bdag gi don mdzad par gyur cig ces smras nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang nam mkha'i phyogs de nyid tu mi snang bar gyur to// de'i tshe yang rgyal po dang btsun mo yang rgyal po pha rol po de'i drang

103b1: byin nas rgyal ba das kyang rgyad ma nas bsunas dgas par babyad mi bzhin du sbyang ba/ / nga margyal ba dang btsun mdas rgyal bu bub kyag gragags pa ma la je ltar btabs pa rgyal ba dal ni bcu badz+ra pa dang / byang/
103b2: po des ji ltar gyur pa de dag thos nas rgyal bu des lus kyi sha khrag gis pha mal bstabs pas sri'u cher byas pa'i drin lan bsams nas/ dmag rnam bzhi bshams nas rgyal po de dang yul bA rA na sder dmag drangs so//
103b3: de'i tshe rgyal po de dmag rnam bzhi dang chas nas lam du zhugs te/ rgyal bu dang bral ba'i gnas su phyin pa dang / 'di snyam du bdag gi bu ni gdon mi za bar 'di nyid du shin bu'i dus pa tsam bsdus te phyir bdag gi yul du bsum
103b4: ro snyam du bsams nas skad phyung nas ngu zhing bu'i dus bu sdud du sor song ba las rgyad ma nas bdag gi bu lus kyi rma yang sos nas sngabs kyang bzang zhing mdzes te drung du 'ongs so/ / de nas rgyal pos bang du blangs te/ khyod dngung /
103b5: gsan nam zhes smras pa dang / rgyal bus ji ltar gyur pa yab rgyal po dang btsun mo la smras so// rgyal po dang btsun mo rab tu dga' ste thams cad bal glang la zhon nas phyir bdag gi yul du phyin pa dang / rgyal bu de'i bsod
103b6: nams kyi mthus bdag gi yul yang phyir thob nas rgyal bu don grub rgyal por dbang bskur te rgyal por bcug go/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yab rgyal por gyur pa de gzhan
103b7: zhig yin snyam du khyed sems na de de ltar mi lta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yab rgyal po de ni da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na yum du gyur pa de ni gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyed
103b8: sems na de de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni da ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes shes bya ba yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu don grub ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi lta'o// de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu de ni/

104a1: da ltar shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar yin no// de'i tshe nga'i dus na brgya byin lha'i dbang por gyur pa de ni da ltar kun shes kau tIn+ya zhes bya ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis pha ma la sri zhu byed ba'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i
104a2: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag nyi shu snyed kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don la mkhas pa'i tshig gi spobs pa thob par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' khri brag bcu gnyis kyis mi skye
104a3: ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po/ / gzhan yang phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rdul phra rab rnyed kyis theg pa gnyis kyi sems spangs te theg pa gcig gi mthar byin par gyur to// dge bsnyen dang / da
104a4: bsnyen ma rdul phra rab snyed kyis 'bras bu dang po nas theg pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to/ / lha dang mi brgya stong snyed ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// de ma yin pa lha dang klu dang /
104a5: yi dgas dang lha ma yin dang / dri za dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i tshogs mang po rnams la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas nyan thos dang rang sangs
104a6: rgyas kyi bar nga sems bskyed par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsam pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du ba ma la sri 'u bya ba'i phyir lus kyi sha dang khrag gis kyang pha mal
104a7: bstabs shing shin du spyad dka' ba spyod pa ni 'di lta bu yin no/ / 'khor mang po/ thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas so so nas phan pa dang bde ba'i don rnyed de/ dga' rangs nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te g.yas
104a8: phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas phyir dong ngo / / thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las sri zhu'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo/

104b1: bam po gnyis pa// de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po'i nang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis skad ma mang po zil gyis mnan pa lta bu'am/ klu 'khyil ba'i 'ja' tshon ltar 'tsher zhing gsal ba la blta/
104b2: namig mi chags pa bzhin nam/ bsams na yid 'khrul pa tsam du 'od zer lham me/ lhang rer bzhugs te/ dper mi bzod pa ni srin bu me khyer gyi 'od nyi ma shar ma thag tu mi snang ba'am/ nyi zla la 'od zer brgya stong snying yod kyang brgya
104b3: byin gyi drung na sol thung lta bu 'am/ brgya byin la 'od bsal ba yod kyang tshangs pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi drung na gyo mo 'am/ gseg ma lta bu 'am/ mtshan mo dang nor bu rin po che'i 'od du bsnun pa tsam 'am/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po
104b4: la 'od zer dam pa brgya stong snyed yod pa'i 'od thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi drung na sol ba'i phung po ltar gyur to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi mdog gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig
104b5: rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar gyur to/ / de dag na gnas pa'i sems can dag la 'od zer des reg na dmus long ni mig gis gzugs mthong bar 'gyur/ lus srur po ni lus rangs par 'gyur/ dbang po nyams pa rnams ni
104b6: dbang po tshad zhing yan lag dang nying lag dang ldan par gyur/ myos pa rnams ni dran pa phyir rnyed par gyur/ mdor na ji tsam du yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad dang bral te 'dod pa bzhin thob par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil
104b7: 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun bcu snyed stan las langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan brgya stong du skor ba byas nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do/ / thams cad kyis
104b8: skad 'thun par tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par stong pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtog med dbyangs dang / byang

105a1: chub sems dpa' bde ba 'ba' zhig sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' drim med par grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshad med dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa chen po dang / byang chub sems
105a2: dpa' gtsug pud 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig rol dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtog pa spong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes brtsegs dang / byang chub sems
105a3: dpa' dag gnas blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mtshan med dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'od zer dang / byang chub sems dpa' khrozhi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bsrung 'gyur dang / byang
105a4: chub sems dpa' dad pa brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' me tog 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ba de dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i shes rab las dang / byang chub sems dpa' do 'phral 'chang dang /
105a5: byang chub sems dpa' bsam du med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa sbyin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen las dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i me tog gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' shin tu sems dang /
105a6: byang chub sems dpa' dpag med chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa'i yid dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu dang
105a7: byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu 'chang dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa chen pos skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dra ba med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba rol dang / byang chub sems dpa' de na gnas dang /
105a8: byang chub sems dpa' grangs med lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu lci ba'i sdong po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyu las 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu 'gro dang //

105b1: byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sde chen mkhas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ris skyob dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gsum 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' do 'phral yod//
105b2: dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags pa brjod dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge bcan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dus tshong nga rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i snying po
105b3: dang / byang chub sems dpa' srid mngon ston dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od rgyad gsal dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i ri dang / byang chub sems dpa' srid len sbyin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba min dang /
105b4: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' mgu rangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtan dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'greb med dang / byang chub sems dpa' grags ldan dang / byang
105b5: chub sems dpa' 'jigs med dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtshag lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgron ma chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub
105b6: sems dpa' thabs chen stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa' mun nag sel dang / byang chub sems dpa' mnyam med phyogs la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar yi dam 'di
105b7: skad bcas so/ / bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi chos bsrung zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rgyas par bgyi zhing rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o// de ci'i
105b8: slad du zhe na/ bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong nas 'od zer de dag las sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab par yang thos par gyur/ chos de dag thos nas

106a1: sems kyi sgrib pa dang bral te kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad byung nas lha'i rin po che gser ltar sems rnam par dag par gyur bas thams cad gsal bar snang bar gyur pa'i phyir ro/ / bdag cag gis
106a2: phan pa dang / bde ba'i yon tan 'di lta bu ngan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la ston pa chen por 'du shes skyes so// byams pa'i pha ma lta bu'i 'du shes skyes nas rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi bka dren dran te sangs rgyas bka' drin
106a3: shes par bgyid do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dam pa'i chos thos pas ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te sems can thams cad sgrol bar 'gyur ro// de dag kyang chos
106a4: pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun bcu po 'di
106a5: dag yun ring po nas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi sngon rol na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ga ga'i gling gi byem snyed bad+ha stod snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed la bsnyen bkur
106a6: byas te/ sangs rgyas de dag las rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad cing rgyal ba de dag la mi skyo ba'i sems kyis mnyes par byas nas/ byams pas bdag gi lus bsrungs te sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dzin cing snying rje chen pos
106a7: rgyun tu phyogs bcur thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed do/ / sems can gang zhig tha ma shi kar byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gcig gi ming ngam/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi nas bdun bcu'i bar du
106a8: bde bar thos te/ de la srog phyogs skyabs su song na tshe 'phos mdzag tu gang na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su pad mo las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing 'dod cha gra dang yongs su bral ba dang / mngal gyi gnas

106b1: nas mi skye ba dang / man ma zhing bcog pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag cing lus mi shes pa dang / thams cad kyi yi du'ang nang bkungs byang bar 'gyur ro// kun gyi yid dung shing bkur gi byas pas sems
106b2: rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / sems rab tu dga' bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas sems
106b3: can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par 'gyur/ de ltar byams pa dang snying rje'i sems bskyed pas 'gro ba ma lus pa la btang snyom
106b4: su mi gtong ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ gzhan yang sems can la phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i sems dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang bar cha 'gyur ba gsal ba'i sems dang / na
106b5: mongs bzhi par byed pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen cing rtag tu bkur sti byed pa'i sems dang / 'dun pa'i yid kyis chos nyan pa'i sems dang / mi brjed par yid 'byed cing don bzang po gzungs su
106b6: 'dzin pa'i sems dang / nyung du thos la don mang du shes pa'i sems dang / mang du thos la don mi shes pa mi 'dod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang dag pa nyid la dang ba'i sems dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ngan la bar
106b7: pa la dad pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i don bden pa la dad pa'i sems skyes pas ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i
106b8: sems skyes pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur/ de ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skyes pas sems can de dag thams cad la mnyam snyoms pa'i gnyen po'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar bdag khams

107a1: gsum pa'i srid pa nyi shu lngar skye bar mi dga' ba bzhin du gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / rkang bzhi dang rkang mangs dang / grog sbur nas srog chags thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na
107a2: byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog gi bar du stor yang pha rol po'i srog 'phrog pa'i las mi byed do/ / ji ltar bdag la nor rdzas dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / bal glang dang / shing rta dang theg
107a3: pa dang / yul dang / grong khyer dang / chung ma dang / bu dang lus kyi yan lag gi bar du longs spyod rnams la srung zhing rim gro byed do// gzhan gyis khyer zhing 'phrag pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang
107a4: 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang sems can rnams kyi nor dang / gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / longs spyod la 'phrog pa'i sems mi skyed do// ji ltar bdag gi gzugs
107a5: dam pa sring mo 'am/ chung ma 'am/ sras la gzhan gyi mi rigs pa byed mi 'dod pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog stor kyang
107a6: pha rol po'i gzugs dam pa la 'du shes ngan pa log pa'i sems mi skyed na mi rigs pa'i chos ngan pa lta ci smos/ ji ltar bdag phra ma dang tshig rtsub po 'khrug par 'gyur ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can rnams
107a7: kya de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yal yang rdzun du smra ba dang phan tshun 'khrug pa'i tshig mi smra'o// ji ltar bdag rdo dathug gis brdeg pa dang / lhag gis gzhu ba dang / nan
107a8: la 'bor ba la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus dang srog yang rdo dbyug dang / lhag dang / chad pas gcad pa'i las kyis sems can

107b1: rnams la mi 'tshe'o/ / ji ltar bdag lcags spog dang / khong sril dang / gzung ba dang / btags pa dang / bcing bas bcings pa'i gnod pa rnams la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can kun kyang de dang 'dra ste/ debs na byang
107b2: chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog yal yang lpags sgrog dang / khong sgril dang / gzung ba dang / bcing ba la sogs pa gnod pas 'tshe bar mi byed do// ji ltar bdag gzhan gyis brnyas pa dang / dbang dang drag shul
107b3: byed pa dang / dbang rlom pa can byed/ snyems shing ngan du byed pa la mi dga' ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gcig pu'i lus dang srog yal yang
107b4: tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i mi rigs pas sems can la gnod pa mi byed do/ / ji ltar bdag la pha rol po gzhan gyis bkur sti byed cing mchod dam/ tshig snyan pas bstod na bdag bde ba la dga' ba bzhin du
107b5: bdag kyang sems can rnams la gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen ci dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sbyin par byed do// gal te bdag gis las chen po zhig sgrub pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi
107b6: phyir ram/ chos kyi phyir ram/ dge 'dun gyi phyir ram/ don sgrub pa las blos mi lcogs te don grub par ma gyur nas mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis gdungs pa las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag gis bsgrub pa'i
107b7: don ma grub pas mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed par mthong na bdag la 'di skad zer ro/ / rigs kyi bu khyod mi dga' ba ma byed cig/ khyod kyi don grub pa'i grogs bya'o// don yid bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o zhes zer na de la rab tu
107b8: dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ de bas na bdag gis sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du bsgrub pa'i las kyi grogs bya'o// ji ltar bdag la rgyal po dang / rkun po dang chu'am/ mes gnod par 'gyur ram/ blon po

108a1: la sogs pas bzung dam btags sam/ bcings na mi dga' ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur pa las mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis bdag de ltar mya ngan gyis gdungs pa mthong na snyan pa sgra'i cheg/
108a2: dgal byed mya ngan ma byed cag/ khyod kyi phyir lo bo rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po la gsol ba btab ste// gal ten nor gsug sbyin pa'am/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis cenas kyang khyod mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal las
108a3: thar par bya'o zhes zer na/ bdag gis tshig de thos pa tsam gyis sems dga' bar 'gyur te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni shes par bya ba'i sgra rtsal dang / bzo bor du mthar phyin par brtson 'grus sa slob 'o// 'dis/
108a4: ste/ shes par bya ba rig pa'i gnas dang / bza'i gnas dang rol mo dang / rtsed mo dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang / mig 'phrul gyis sngags dang / sman dang bal gling dang / rta dang / bzhon pa dang / dgra chos dang / dmag drang ba dang / dpyad
108a5: lasogs pa la mkhas par slob ste/ / de ltar spyarna la ci la yang mkhas par bslabs nas 'gro ba mang po dang / rgyal po dang / blon po chen po la sogs pa yang bsams pa'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byed/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang yongs
108a6: spyod kyi rkyen gas sam/ nor ram zas sam/ bza' ba'am badrang ba'am/ nor bu'am/ gadra bu'am/ lus kyi rgyan nam/ gser ram ngul lam/ bai dUn+ya 'am man shel lam// sngag gam mu tig gam/ a s+sa ga b+ha 'am/ nor u0f7f/
108a7: rin po che'am/ bal grang ngam/ rgyab ma thag pa'am/ bran po 'am// las byed pa ma 'am/ chung ma'am/ sras kyang yod// chu migags// khrus kyi rting bya'am/ ngan ma tsha'i yang tog ca pa'am/ longs spyod byas kyad rnam pa sna tshogs/
108a8: yod kyang byang chub sems dpa' dal rnam pa'am rgyags pa'i sems med do// de skar sA rtsal ldan la sa mthas/ rin po che'i ba mdzad brgya stong dang yang ldan/ pan kla dang / rta dang / thegapa pang 'dzin chung bzang mo yang grangs med

108b1: bar yod yang tog bzang po yang yod/ chu mig dang khrus kyi rdzing bu la sogs pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gang yang yod mod kyi/ de la ma chags te rtag tu 'dod pa nyung ba dang / chos shes pa la dga' zhing bas mtha' dang dkon pa dang / ri
108b2: dang / tshal dang / shing drung dra bsam gtan la zhi bar gnas pa lams so// skye bo mang pa dang spu zhing gta ma zer yang sems ni rtag tu gnyen po'i sgor 'jug par byed do// sa so 'i skye bo dang spyod tshul 'thun pa ltar byad kyang sems
108b3: can la phan pa'i don tu nor bu rin po che gtong bar byed kyis sems can la gnod pa mi phan pa 'don mi byed do/ / gang dbul ba phongs pa nyam thag par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpa' la slong du 'ongs na de la ci 'dod pa
108b4: bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sbyin par byed do/ / sems can gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos shing dang de/ byang chub sems dpa' la bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rim gro dang g.yog byed cing rkang pa 'khru ba'i las byed/
108b5: dam/ bdud bkru ba dang mnye ba'i las byed dam/ chag chag dang phyag dar byed dam/ so shing dang khrus chur sbyor ram/ mal stan 'dings shing mal gos sprug pa'i las byed dam/ srong dang tho rangs la mar me 'brang ngam/ le'u sus
108b6: dang / drol kha zas than ba na dang / bu shin dang / khang ne 'bul lam/ 'thung ba'i skom yu li shi dang / bul sha ka'i 'bras bu'i skom dang / rgun chu dang / khar nag po'i chul sogs pa sbyar sbyar nas yo byad de lta bus zhag bdun nas zhag
108b7: dgu bcu'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' la chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'bral byed byang chub sems dpa' de'i cha mchod pa'i yo byad 'bul ba de la dga' ba'i sems med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa ni bskal pa grangs
108b8: med pa yun ring po nas sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir/ / sems can thams cad la skye dang bri'i sems med pa'i phyir/ byams pa dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir/ mnyam snyoms pa'i sems la gnas pa'i phyir ro// de

109a1: bas na dus kha cig tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed de/ rtag tu dge ba bcu'i chos kyis sems can gyi don byed do// sems can de dag kyang rgyal po'i yid bzhin du dga' zhing spyod pas tshe'i dus byas na yang lha dang
109a2: mi'i 'jig rten du 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod mchog dam pa dang ldan te/ rigs che zhing mtho bar skye bar 'gyur/ bsam pa'i yid bzhin du nyal ba dang / ldang ba dang / 'gro ba la gnod pa med par 'gyur/ gnas gang du 'gro yang bzhon
109a3: ba'i rta dang theg par ldan te bskyed mos tshal du rtsed mo dang rol mo la rtsa zhing longs spyod par 'gyur/ bza' ba dang btung ba dam pa dang dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur yang tha ma mi rtag pa bsten te/ rga ba dang na bas gzir te shi bar gyur na
109a4: khyim gyi bu slad mya ngan gyis gdungs te skad phyung nas ngu zhing la la ni mgo la thal mo rdebs/ la la ni rang rang gi skra 'bal te mchi ma 'dzag cing sa la 'gre'o// de nas khyogs sam shing rta'i steng du bzhag nas ngur khrod du bsgyel te/ de
109a5: ltar bskyal nas kyang bu smad dag gis phyir khyim du 'ongs nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te la la ni rgyal nas sa la 'gre/ la la ni de'i rkyen gyis nang du 'gyur/ la la ni mi dran pas myos/ la la ni tshe'i bar chad du shi bar byas te/ de
109a6: ltar byas kyang gson pa rnams la ni phan pa med/ shi ba la ni rab tu gnod do// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas te yul rgyu zhing song ba las/ sems can mya ngan gyis gzir ba mthong nas snying rtse
109a7: ba'i sems skyes te 'di skad zer ro/ / rgyal po zhes bya ba ni yul sa dbang zhing 'gro ba mang po'i dbang sgyur te/ de ltar dge ba bcu'i lam gyis 'gro ba rnams btul te/ 'bras bu 'dod pa lnga mchog dam pa thob tu zin kyang skye ba
109a8: dang / rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mi rtag pas 'jigs pa las thar par ma gyur na bdag gis drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid btsas kyang phan pa'i don med do// de ltar 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don med na 'khor los sgyur ba'i

109b1: ba'i rgyal po chen pa zhes kyang ji skad bya/ byams pa chen pa'i bzhe'am/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po zhe'am/ 'dren pa'i ston pa chen po zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i lam du 'dren cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam san te/ 'dus ma byas/
109b2: pa'i rab tu bde ba thob par byed do// bdag cag na ming dang spyod par mi mthun te/ dper na mi zhig skom pas gdungs nas srog la bab pa las chu 'dod pa'i phyir phan tshun brgyugs te/ khron pa bzang po zhig dang phrang nas rab tu dag
109b3: ba'i sems skyes te/ 'di snyam du sems so// nga ni bdag gi lus 'di 'chi ba las phyir sos so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te chu dang ma phrad na srog 'di 'chi ba las mi ring ba las khron pa bzang po dang phrad nas gdon mi za bar chu dang /
109b4: grang mo gtsang ma dang phrad de ngoms shing tshim par 'gyur bas srog 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// snyam bsams nas myur ba myur bar khron pa'i drung du bsnyen to// khron pa'i drung du phyin nas lus la gyon pa'i gos phung de phyogs gcig tu sbas
109b5: nas chu 'dod pa'i phyir khron pa'i nang du zhugs so/ / khron pa'i gting du phyin na chu ni med kyi sbrul gdug pa dang / sdigs pa dang / sdig pa dang / rtsangs pa dang / sbal ba dang / gyo mo dang / de la sogs pa gseg ma dang / shing dang / rtsa nyal
109b6: nyi la 'ba' zhig mthong bar gyur to/ / de'i tshe skom pas nyam thag par gyur pa de thog ma re ba bzhin du chu yang ma rnyed la gdug pa mang pos bzas nas khron pa de las phyir byung bar gzas kyang khron pa rnyings shing zhig la zabs kyang
109b7: mda' rgyang gang tsam yod de/ de'i nang na skas sam/ thag srad dam/ 'bru ba'i shing tsam yang med de/ mas mchod du brtsal yang nyam thag la stobs zhan pas 'bar mi nus te/ phyir yang zhabs su lhung nas sbrul gdug pa la sogs
109b8: bas za zhing 'jib bo/ / de chung zad cig srog ma chad kyi bar du 'di skad ces zer ro// bdag khron pa 'di'i nang na chu med par sngar shes na lta khron pa 'di la mig gi lta yang mi bong na 'di'i nang du zhugs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ da ni

110a1: dran pa 'da'i rgyan gyis drug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal myang bar gyur te zhes smra sngags 'don to/ / 'bang las sbyar ba'i rgyal ba yang de ltar sas smra ba dag gcig gi ba'i 'og tu khyim gang gi buskrad dang / gnyen
110a2: rnams kyis sdug pa dang bye bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa mthong nas 'di skad zer ro/ / bdag gi lus 'di ni khron pa skam po de dang 'dra ste/ khron pa ming tsam yod kyi chu ni med pas na/ 'jug pa yod kyang thob pa med
110a3: pas de lta bu'i lus dang srog stor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur te/ / da ltar bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang sgyur zhing rin po che sna bdun dang ldan te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyis 'gro ba 'dul zhing drang po'i chos
110a4: kyis yul gyi srid btsas nas skye bo mang po dag lha dang mi'i mtho ris kyi gnas su dkod de 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan mchog dam pa la longs spyod du bcug kyang de dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / sdug pan
110a5: dang / dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal las thar bar ma nus te/ gcig la gcig ngu zhing tsho de byed pa 'di ni bdag gis nyes kyi sems can rnams kyis mnyes so// de ji lta zhe na/ bdag la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
110a6: 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i don du 'gyur ba med de/ bdag las dge ba'i chos 'dod cing rab tu bde ba 'dod kyang sdug bsngal gyi mtsho las rgal mi nus so// de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang 'di snyam du sems so//
110a7: ltar bdag gis lus 'di ni dper na shes pa med pa gti mug can gyi sbyin bdag dang 'dra'o// de'i tshe dus gzhan zhig na lo bdun gyi bar du char ma bab pas than pa chen po byung ste/ rtsi shing yang skams/ 'bru yang rab tu dkon par
